trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The muscular alchemist needs help finding ingredients for paint.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the muscular alchemist.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_TODO_01<tab>Coat the muscular alchemist in fragrant oil.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_TODO_02<tab>Lie in wait at the designated location and defeat the vajralangula.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the amra to the muscular alchemist.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the muscular alchemist.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_001<tab>You there! Adventurer! I find myself in need of assistance. You will help me, won't you?

TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_002<tab>You see, I received an order for custom paints, but the necessary ingredients are rather rare. The amra in particular is difficult to come by, as it must be taken from a vajralangula.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_003<tab>And not just any old fruit will do! Only one held by the strongest, most virile male specimen will suffice.

TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_004<tab>I know of a sure way to attract a suitable vajralangula, but I'm afraid defeating the beast is beyond me. If only a strong, brave, kind adventurer could protect poor little me!
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_A1_000_001<tab>I'm at your service!
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_A1_000_002<tab>I expect a handsome reward.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_005<tab>I feel safer already! Come now, I will lead you to where the vajralangula gather. We head southeast.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_006<tab>I've kept you waiting long enough. Let's get to it, shall we?
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_007<tab>Take this perfume and douse my frail, meager body in it. I must be as a flower dripping with sweet nectar!
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_008<tab>Quickly, now! Slather it on, else I won't catch the attention of even the weakest vajralangula.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_009<tab>Perfect! I'm positively irresistible!
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_010<tab>Now, I'll use my wiles and enticing scent to lure a vajralangula this way. You wait here, and prepare to strike him down!
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_100_010<tab>I'll lure a vajralangula this way. You wait here, and prepare to strike!
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_011<tab>Such valiance! I could hardly tear my eyes away as you heroically slayed the beast! ...Now, the fruit, if you please.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_012<tab>Mmm, yes. Perfectly, succulently ripe. This will make a fine paint.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_013<tab>Our work here is done. Let us return to the Great Work before another vajralangula sets its sights on me.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_014<tab>Many thanks for your assistance, adventurer. I never imagined I could procure such a fine component for my paint.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_015<tab>Say, do you know why the vajralangula carry this fruit? They present them to their desired mates. Hence the scented oils. Pheromones, you see.

TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_016<tab>The amra is also the official fruit of Thavnair. You can eat it or use it as painting material as I shall, of course, but it is also said to ward off evil, and secure a strong family lineage.

TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_017<tab>But there's more to this fruit than mere superstition. It has sufficient antibacterial properties to be used as a household remedy to keep any family well.
TEXT_AKTKZA023_04202_MACHOALCHEMIST_000_018<tab>Oh but listen to me, rambling on and on! Allow me to thank you once more. I hope our paths will cross again!
